segment.source: Description: As you submit your app, you have the option to use the Notes for certification page to provide additional info to the certification testers.
segment.target: Description: As you submit your app, you have the option to use the Notes for certification page to provide additional info to the certification testers.

segment.source: This info can help ensure that your app is tested correctly.
segment.target: This info can help ensure that your app is tested correctly.

segment.source: title: Notes for certification
segment.target: title: Notes for certification

segment.source: ms.assetid: 4A740A5F-F39F-4FE2-9391-EE00DB46B25A
segment.target: ms.assetid: 4A740A5F-F39F-4FE2-9391-EE00DB46B25A

segment.source: Notes for certification
segment.target: Notes for certification

segment.source: As you submit your app, you have the option to use the Notes for certification page to provide additional info to the certification testers.
segment.target: As you submit your app, you have the option to use the Notes for certification page to provide additional info to the certification testers.

segment.source: This info can help ensure that your app is tested correctly.
segment.target: This info can help ensure that your app is tested correctly.

segment.source: Make sure to include the following (if applicable for your app):
segment.target: Make sure to include the following (if applicable for your app):

segment.source: User names and passwords for test accounts
segment.target: User names and passwords for test accounts

segment.source: If your app requires users to log in to a service, provide the user name and password for a test account.
segment.target: If your app requires users to log in to a service, provide the user name and password for a test account.

segment.source: The certification testers will use this account when reviewing your app.
segment.target: The certification testers will use this account when reviewing your app.

segment.source: Steps to access hidden or locked features
segment.target: Steps to access hidden or locked features

segment.source: If your app has features that might not be obvious to the testers, briefly describe how they can access those features.
segment.target: If your app has features that might not be obvious to the testers, briefly describe how they can access those features.

segment.source: Apps that appear to be incomplete may fail certification.
segment.target: Apps that appear to be incomplete may fail certification.

segment.source: Steps to verify background audio usage
segment.target: Steps to verify background audio usage

segment.source: If your app allows audio to run in the background, testers may need instructions on how to access this feature so they can confirm it functions appropriately.
segment.target: If your app allows audio to run in the background, testers may need instructions on how to access this feature so they can confirm it functions appropriately.

segment.source: Info about what's changed in an app update
segment.target: Info about what's changed in an app update

segment.source: For updates to previously published apps, you may want to let the testers know what has changed, especially if your packages are the same and you're just making changes to your app listing (such as adding more screenshots, changing your app's category, or editing the description).
segment.target: For updates to previously published apps, you may want to let the testers know what has changed, especially if your packages are the same and you're just making changes to your app listing (such as adding more screenshots, changing your app's category, or editing the description).

segment.source: When considering what to write, remember:
segment.target: When considering what to write, remember:

segment.source: A real person will read these notes.
segment.target: A real person will read these notes.

segment.source: Testers will appreciate a polite note and clear, helpful instructions.
segment.target: Testers will appreciate a polite note and clear, helpful instructions.

segment.source: Be succinct and keep instructions simple.
segment.target: Be succinct and keep instructions simple.

segment.source: If you really need to explain more, you can include a link to a page with more info.
segment.target: If you really need to explain more, you can include a link to a page with more info.

segment.source: Keep in mind that customers of your app won't be seeing these notes.
segment.target: Keep in mind that customers of your app won't be seeing these notes.

segment.source: If you need to provide complicated instructions for testing your app, consider whether your app might need to be made simpler so that customers know how to use it.
segment.target: If you need to provide complicated instructions for testing your app, consider whether your app might need to be made simpler so that customers know how to use it.

segment.source: Services and external components must be online and available.
segment.target: Services and external components must be online and available.

segment.source: If your app connects to a service for part of its function, make sure that the service will be online and available.
segment.target: If your app connects to a service for part of its function, make sure that the service will be online and available.

segment.source: Include any information about the service that testers will need.
segment.target: Include any information about the service that testers will need.

segment.source: If your app can't connect to a service it needs during testing, it may fail certification.
segment.target: If your app can't connect to a service it needs during testing, it may fail certification.
